data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Guárico prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guárico, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 90,592 believers living in the state of Guárico. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.section_summary: On average, 52 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Guárico, Venezuela.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Guárico.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Guárico prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 129,592, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 90,592 believers find a person of peace today among the 654,508 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Guárico who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Guárico
location.cities_list: San Fernando de Apure, Calabozo, San Juan de los Morros, Valle de La Pascua, Zaraza
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Fernando de Apure (229,197), Calabozo (168,605), San Juan de los Morros (160,868), Valle de La Pascua (153,136), Zaraza (74,017)
